name: Schizophrenia (itch) (Zekkun)
description:
This game is about a person looking for his friend, but it soon gets weird.. Schizophrenia - a long-term mental disorder of a type involving a breakdown in the relation between thought, emotion, and behavior, leading to faulty perception, inappropriate actions and feelings, withdrawal from reality and personal relationships into fantasy and delusion, and a sense of mental fragmentation. This is my very first game made around 2-3 days.  Music from: 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCG0_u2K9cKrkmQe8M8miB6g
